attributes.additional_details:
Documentrys, scientests have proven that pitbulls are not the the worlds dangerous breed, yet why are these poor soles being murderd.
Compare this 
We discriminate a pitbull for the way it looks from the culture and bad owners, this automaticly makes them Vicious.
We are a country of equality, diverse oppertunitys yet we are judging a dogs death sentance on their appearance.
ITS THE OWNER NOT THE BREED
attributes.background:
Lift the law on pitbulls, we do not discriminate on age, sex, religion, race so why do we do this to dogs?
Its fact that the pitbull is not the most dangerous dog, yet there is a law to murder the pitbull breed. EVERYDAY Pitbulls and all dogs that look like pitbulls  are murdered.
